page_layout.title_area: Title spans top 30% with subtitle and metadata stacked
page_layout.margins: 1in margins, baseline grid for quick alignment

typography.title: Large serif (e.g., 28pt) paired with thin rule
typography.color_accents: Muted blue for sidebars and figure captions

callouts.title: Key Findings

global_guidelines: Respect the layout planner scaffold and keep the hierarchy consistent.
Use shaded sidebars for tips or highlighted learning goals when present.
Switch to two columns after the lead section for denser reading.
plan.narrative: Lead with a hero title, follow with overview prose, then transition into columnar content anchored by figures/tables called out in the draft.
